first_para: Sir Kevin John Barron PC (born 26 October 1946) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Rother Valley since 1983.

full.extract: Sir Kevin John Barron PC (born 26 October 1946) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Rother Valley since 1983.
full.title: Kevin Barron
